I love this bag. I’ve only had it for about a year and I noticed recently that one of the straps is tearing loose. That doesn’t mean the material wasn’t any good. This bag has been through the wringer and has stood the rest of time. So much so that I’m about to repurchase it. This time I plan to be more careful with it now that I know how sturdy it is. It has so many different pockets. In the beginning I use to get frustrated with it because I kept loosing what pocket I stuffed my wallet in. Oh and Amazon please be more thorough with sending off previously used items. My bag came with tampons (NOT USED) in one of the zipped pockets. I was gonna return it just due to that, but I had purchased the last bag and I really needed a new one. The bag came looking brand spanking new, but I was a little bummed that someone else had it first.
I never trusted back packs but this one has theft protection and roomy for all my things. Good for short or long trips.
The material and storage are amazing. The storage it has is insane. Very expensive look and easy to use.

I loved it so much that I bought another Mk backpack purse in March 2024, but it did not last 6 months - the areas near the handle started to come apart at both sides. I wasn’t expecting much for this price point but I was pleasantly surprised. The purse/back pack is beautiful. The color I chose is the navy blue with brown trim and it’s gorgeous! The straps are comfortable and the perfect length for use as a pack or a purse. I needed something for a weekend trip out of town and this fit the bill. Used it to pack my toiletries and my purse essentials. Worked for both without being too much. It does come with a smaller pouch (with a zippered pocket) that I used to hold my “purse things” which was nice. All in all a great purchase and I’m sure I’ll get a lot more use out of it than I had expected! It’s definitely worth the price!

So I bought this for a work trip. I needed limited carry-ons needed to be able to carry a small laptop plus odds and ends. It worked out fine. The biggest drawback is it does not open from the top at all and the space to put in your tablet a.k.a. small laptop is very tight. The opening either needs to be slightly bigger or it needs to open from the top as well. I did like that. The zipper part is against your back when you’re holding it so if you’re in a crowd, nobody can try to steal your stuff , but all in all not bad just didn’t work out for my tablet and travel stuff so keep in mind. If you have a small laptop you’re gonna have to wiggle it and finagle it to get your stuff out. Super pretty though I got lots of compliments even at the airport.
